title: Barriers to Active Learning Classroom (ALC) Adoption and Cooperative Learning Strategies Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Strengthening math problem-solving competencies through collaborative learning in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three cultural/institutional barriers encountered when introducing ALC (Adaptive Learning Contexts)
Learners can apply peer feedback at over 80% frequency during mathematical problem-solving processes using cooperative learning techniques
Learners can identify at least two issues arising when designing team-based learning activities in online environments and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
